locations.name: Altar of Death
locations.description: After you play a card here, destroy it to get +2 Energy next turn.

locations.name: Asgard
locations.description: After turn 4, whoever is winning here draws {location.DrawCount:card|cards}.

locations.name: Asteroid M
locations.description: After you play a 3 or 4-Cost card, move it here.

locations.name: Atlantis
locations.description: If you only have one card here, it has +5 Power.

locations.name: Attilan
locations.description: After turn 3, shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw cards.

locations.name: Avengers Compound
locations.description: On turn 5, all cards must be played here.

locations.name: Bar Sinister
locations.description: After you play a card here, fill this location with copies of it.

locations.name: Bar With No Name
locations.description: Whoever has the least Power here wins.

locations.name: Baxter Building
locations.description: Whoever is winning this location gets +3 Power at the others.

locations.name: Camp Lehigh
locations.description: Add a random 3-Cost card to each player's hand.

locations.name: Central Park
locations.description: Add a Squirrel to each location.

locations.name: Cloning Vats
locations.description: After you play a card here, add a copy to your hand.

locations.name: Collapsed Mine
locations.description: Fill this location with Rocks. Skip a turn to destroy your Rocks.

locations.name: Counter-Earth
locations.description: After you play a card here, create a copy at this location.

locations.name: Crimson Cosmos
locations.description: Cards that cost 1, 2, or 3 can't be played here.

locations.name: Crystal Towers
locations.description: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw 3 cards.

locations.name: Daily Bugle
locations.description: Get a copy of a card in your opponent's hand.

locations.name: Danger Room
locations.description: Cards played here have a 25% chance to be destroyed.

locations.name: Dark Dimension
locations.description: Cards here are not revealed until the game ends.

locations.name: Death's Domain
locations.description: After you play a card here, destroy it.

locations.name: Deep Space
locations.description: Card text is disabled here.

locations.name: District X
locations.description: Replace both decks with 10 random cards.

locations.name: Dream Dimension
locations.description: On turn 5, cards cost more.

locations.name: Ego
locations.description: Ego takes over and plays your cards for you.

locations.name: Elysium
locations.description: Cards cost 1 less.

locations.name: Eternity Range
locations.description: After turn 3, add a Rock to the losing player's side.

locations.name: Fisk Tower
locations.description: When a card moves here, destroy it.

locations.name: Flooded
locations.description: Cards can't be played here.

locations.name: Flooding
locations.description: This is the last turn cards can be played here.

locations.name: Fogwell's Gym
locations.description: Both players get double Card XP this game.

locations.name: Gamma Lab
locations.description: After turn 3, transform all cards here into the Hulk.

locations.name: Genosha
locations.description: You can move cards to this location.

locations.name: Grand Central
locations.description: After turn 5, put a card from each player's hand here.

locations.name: Hala
locations.description: After turn 4, destroy all cards controlled by the player losing here.

locations.name: Hell's Kitchen
locations.description: Draw a 1-Cost card from your deck.

locations.name: Hellfire Club
locations.description: Cards that cost 1 can't be played here.

locations.name: Isle of Silence
locations.description: Ongoing effects are disabled here.

locations.name: Jotunheim
locations.description: After each turn, cards here lose 1 Power.

locations.name: K'un-Lun
locations.description: When a card moves here, give it +2 Power.

locations.name: Kamar-Taj
locations.description: On Reveal effects happen twice at this location.

locations.name: Klyntar
locations.description: After turn 4, merge your cards here into a Symbiote.

locations.name: Knowhere
locations.description: On Reveal effects do not happen at this location.

locations.name: Krakoa
locations.description: On turn 5, takes over and plays both players' cards for them.

locations.name: Kyln
locations.description: You can't play cards here after turn 4.

locations.name: Lamentis-1
locations.description: Draw 3 cards. Destroy both decks.

locations.name: Lechuguilla
locations.description: After you play a card here, shuffle 3 rocks into your deck.

locations.name: Lemuria
locations.description: No cards are revealed this turn.

locations.name: Limbo
locations.description: There is a turn 7 this game.

locations.name: Los Diablos Base
locations.description: After turn 3, ruin a random location.

locations.name: Luke's Bar
locations.description: After you play a card here, return it to your hand.

locations.name: Machineworld
locations.description: After you play a card here, add a copy to the opponent's hand.

locations.name: Madripoor
locations.description: You can move cards from this location.

locations.name: Milano
locations.description: Turn 5 is the only turn cards can be played here.

locations.name: Mindscape
locations.description: At the start of turn 6, swap hands.

locations.name: Miniaturized Lab
locations.description: On turns 3, 4, and 5, no cards can be added here.

locations.name: Mirror Dimension
locations.description: On turn 4, transform into one of the other locations.

locations.name: Mojoworld
locations.description: Whoever has more cards here gets +100 Power.

locations.name: Monster Island
locations.description: Add a Monster-Power here for each player.

locations.name: Monster Metropolis
locations.description: The card(s) with the highest Power here get +3 Power.

locations.name: Morag
locations.description: You can't play your first card here each turn.

locations.name: Mother Mold
locations.description: When you play a card here, add a Sentinel to your hand.

locations.name: Mt. Wundagore
locations.description: After you play a card here, discard a card.

locations.name: Muir Island
locations.description: After each turn, give cards here +1 Power.

locations.name: Murderworld
locations.description: After turn 3, destroy all cards here.

locations.name: Necrosha
locations.description: Cards here have -2 Power.

locations.name: Negative Zone
locations.description: Cards here have -3 Power.

locations.name: Nidavellir
locations.description: Cards here have +5 Power.

locations.name: Nova Roma
locations.description: Draw a card.

locations.name: Olympia
locations.description: Draw 2 cards.

locations.name: Onslaught's Citadel
locations.description: Ongoing effects here are doubled.

locations.name: Orchis Forge
locations.description: After you play a card here, add a Sentinel to your hand.

locations.name: Oscorp Tower
locations.description: After turn 3, all cards here swap sides.

locations.name: Pet Mansion
locations.description: This turn, all cards must be played here.

locations.name: Pleasant Hill
locations.description: After you play a card here, draw a card.

locations.name: Plunder Castle
locations.description: Only cards that cost 6 can be played here.

locations.name: Project Pegasus
locations.description: +5 Energy this turn.

locations.name: Quantum Realm
locations.description: After you play a card here, set its base Power to 2.

locations.name: Quantum Tunnel
locations.description: After you play a card here, swap it with a card in your deck.

locations.name: Rickety Bridge
locations.description: After each turn, if there is more than one card here, destroy them.

locations.name: Sakaar
locations.description: Put a card from each player's hand here.

locations.name: Sanctum Sanctorum
locations.description: Cards can't be played here.

locations.name: Savage Land
locations.description: Add two Raptors on each side of this location.

locations.name: Sewer System
locations.description: Cards here have -1 Power.

locations.name: Shadowland
locations.description: Add a Ninja to each side with Power.

locations.name: Shuri's Lab
locations.description: After you play a card here, double its Power.

locations.name: Sinister London
locations.description: After you play a card here, add a copy to another location.

locations.name: Sokovia
locations.description: Discard a card from each player's hand.

locations.name: Stark Tower
locations.description: After turn 5, give all cards here + Power.

locations.name: Starlight Citadel
locations.description: After turn 4, swap the position of each location.

locations.name: Strange Academy
locations.description: After turn 5, move all cards here to other random locations.

locations.name: Subterranea
locations.description: Shuffle 5 rocks into each deck.

locations.name: T.A.H.I.T.I.
locations.description: When a card is discarded or destroyed, add a copy here.

locations.name: The Bifrost
locations.description: After turn 4, move all cards one location to the right.

locations.name: The Big House
locations.description: Cards that cost 4, 5, or 6 can't be played here.

locations.name: The Hub
locations.description: Add a random card to each player's hand.

locations.name: The Ice Box
locations.description: Give a card in each player’s hand +1 Cost.

locations.name: The Nexus
locations.description: Your Power here is granted to other locations as well.

locations.name: The Peak
locations.description: Each card in your hand swaps its Power and Cost.

locations.name: The Raft
locations.description: First to fill this breaks out a 6-Cost card. It costs 0.

locations.name: The Sacred Timeline
locations.description: First to fill this gets a copy of their opening hand.

locations.name: The Sandbar
locations.description: Cards with abilities can’t be played here.

locations.name: The Space Throne
locations.description: Only one card can be here for each player.

locations.name: The Superflow
locations.description: If you have no cards here, +1 energy each turn.

locations.name: The Triskelion
locations.description: Fill each player's hand with random cards.

locations.name: The Vault
locations.description: On turn 6, cards can't be played here.

locations.name: Throne Room
locations.description: Card(s) here with the highest Power have their Power doubled.

locations.name: Tinkerer's Workshop
locations.description: +1 Energy this turn.

locations.name: Titan
locations.description: 6-Cost cards cost less.

locations.name: Transia
locations.description: Swap the positions of each location.

locations.name: TVA
locations.description: After turn 4, end the game.

locations.name: Utopia
locations.description: On turn 4, cards here can move.

locations.name: Vibranium Mines
locations.description: After you play here, shuffle 3 Vibranium into your deck.

locations.name: Vormir
locations.description: The first card you play here is destroyed.

locations.name: Wakanda
locations.description: Cards here can't be destroyed.

locations.name: Wakandan Embassy
locations.description: Give +2 Power to cards in players' hands.

locations.name: Warrior Falls
locations.description: After each turn, cards here FIGHT! Destroy the weakest one(s).

locations.name: Washington D.C.
locations.description: Cards here with no abilities have +3 Power.

locations.name: Weirdworld
locations.description: Both players draw from their opponent's decks.

locations.name: Westview
locations.description: Turns into a new location on turn 4.

locations.name: Worldship
locations.description: Destroy the other locations.

locations.name: X-Mansion
locations.description: After turn 3, add a random card here for each player.

locations.name: Xandar
locations.description: Cards here have +1 Power.
